name: alone (itch) (John Peter C.)
description:
alone is a short story-driven game about a guy named Michael Williams, who is going through some difficulties in his life and considers himself an alone person.

WARNING: This game has some content that may let the player uncomfortable.

Created and written by John Peter C.

Voiced by:

RyanMcManus (https://www.castingcall.club/m/RyanMcManus);
Ryan Wichael (https://www.castingcall.club/m/Merry_Ryan);
lollilady (https://www.castingcall.club/m/lollilady);
BoringKeys (https://www.castingcall.club/m/BoringKeys);
Joseph Way (https://www.castingcall.club/m/yakukasai);
Andy James (https://www.castingcall.club/m/AndyJames);
Providence Greene (https://www.castingcall.club/m/ProvidenceMG);
Cole Lindsay (https://www.castingcall.club/m/ColeDoesVoices);
Ellie E. McMahon (https://www.castingcall.club/m/elliemcmahon).

THANK YOU so much for your amazing work on the game!! Don't forget to check their other jobs on Casting Call Club.

Feel free to record a video of the game if you want to!
